ch.se.inf.ethz.jcd.batman.cli.command

Class CreateCommand

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.se.inf.ethz.jcd.batman.cli.command.CreateCommand
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Command

    public class CreateCommand
extends java.lang.Object
implements Command
    Provides a CLI command to create a new virtual disk. The command to create a disk the following command can be used: create /some/host/path/to/a/file

    • Method Detail

      • getAliases

        public java.lang.String[] getAliases()
        Description copied from interface: Command
        Returns all aliases for the command. An alias is a string that represents a call to a command. This allows commands to have more than one defining string sequence that will execute the command.
        Specified by:
        getAliases in interface Command
        Returns:
        an array of aliases for the command

      • execute

        public void execute(CommandLine caller,
           java.lang.String alias,
           java.lang.String... params)
        Description copied from interface: Command
        This method starts the execution of the command. It provides the command with the alias used to invoke the command and a list of parameters (may be empty) that the user provided.
        Specified by:
        execute in interface Command
        Parameters:
        caller - the caller of the command
        alias - the alias used to invoke the command
        params - provided parameters for the command. May be empty.
